name: xkcd: Automation
caption: xkcd.com
description: Warning: this comic occasionally contains strong language (which may be unsuitable for children), unusual humor (which may be unsuitable for adults), and advanced mathematics (which may be unsuitable for liberal-arts majors).

data.message: That's why you don't automate the first time you do a task, you leave it to the 2nd or 3rd time when you have better visibility of how frequently you may do it, and a solid fully-working base to build from, so you only focus on automation not both automation and task
